programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a sergeant's son is accused of rape, Benson is put in a difficult position and forced to make a choice between loyalty and duty.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The case of a 6-year-old boy who disappeared from his bed in the midst of his mother's wild, drug-fueled party causes Benson to think about her own role as a mother.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Fin revisits his military roots to help a fellow Army Ranger who is struggling to recover from a sexual assault.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An investigation hits a nerve with Benson when a suspect claims his genetic makeup causes him to commit rape.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives interrogate the CEO of a recording company and his protégé for their involvement in an assault on a transgender student.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The kidnapping of a young boy reminds Cragen, Munch and Benson of an unsolved case from 13 years earlier.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A promising singer is beaten by her boyfriend, a famous hip-hop star, but she refuses to help ADA Barba build his case; the defendant and his attorney turn the case into a media circus.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: As a series of rapes on the Upper West Side puts the city on edge, a celebrity chef (Cybill Shepherd) fears she is the next victim when someone follows her home; Detective Benson has a hard time overcoming her traumatic ordeal.

programme.desc: A 4-year-old student makes claims of sexual abuse against a singing coach and popular TV personality (Billy Porter).

programme.desc: A famous fashion photographer accused of raping a young model asks his successful brother to help him avoid charges.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
